text: Alberto Sordi (15 June 1920 â€“ 24 February 2003) was an Italian actor, singer, composer, comedian, director and screenwriter.Sordi won seven David di Donatello awards. It is Italy's most honorable movie award. He also received a Golden Lion for lifetime achievement at the Venice Film Festival in 1995.
